meanings.sent1: We were congaing at the party last night.

meanings.definition: To participate in a conga line.
meanings.sent1: They were congaing joyfully at the parade.
meanings.sent2: People were congaing happily at the beach party.
meanings.sent3: The ants were congaing in a line towards the picnic leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The cars congaed along the highway, moving in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The students were congaing in the school gym during the dance competition.
